name: Supply Block
description:
In Supply Block, you play a robot against an evil AI trying to destroy you by dropping blocks on you. You must dodge blocks and jump on them to fix them.

Controls:

A and D to move, Space to jump, R to restart

Sounds made with bfxr

Show Your Moves Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
